Rough weather in Denver put them in a travel bind, and they arrived at the Pepsi Center only 90 minutes before tipoff, or about the same time Allen Iverson finally made it. We will never have a worse travel day than today, Kings coach Eric Musselman said.`` Our energy and effort was phenomenal.''
